alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 6:48AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY FROM TALKEETNA NORTH... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches from Talkeetna north. * WHERE...Talkeetna north. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin Thursday morning and continue into Thursday night. The snow will be heaviest during the morning and early afternoon hours Thursday. Highest accumulations are expected along the Parks Highway from Willow to Broad Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
